      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PayaraMicroRuntime PayaraMicroBoot.bootStrap()
      Boots the Payara Micro Server.
      PayaraMicroRuntime PayaraMicroBoot.getRuntime()
      Get a handle on the running Payara instance to manipulate the server once running

    • Uses of PayaraMicroRuntime in fish.payara.micro.impl

      Classes in fish.payara.micro.impl that implement PayaraMicroRuntime 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PayaraMicroRuntimeImpl
      This class represents a running Payara Micro server and enables you to manipulate a running server.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
